official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Transportation to issue a certificate of documentation which authorizes the vessel ALBERT to engage in the coastwise trade.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the department in which the Coast Guard is operating to cause a named vessel to be documented as a vessel of the United States entitled to engage in the coastwise trade.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Transportation to issue a certificate of documentation which authorizes the vessel ALBERT to engage in the coastwise trade.
